civilopediaText.text: Captain!
"Captain? Can you hear us? Captain! Wake up Captain! Hey, they're waking up! They're alive! Long live the Captain!"
Due to an unkown critical failure, our spaceship's reactor entered meltdown forcing everyone to get to the escape pods.
Some of us landed in escape pods nearby and managed to form a small group. We don't have many resources but we had enough to create this small encampment.
The search for our people
Captain! We have managed to set up a proper camp, but it became clear that we are missing most of our population.
Our people are worried for their friends and families, they're imploring you to research and construct the beacon to help guide the lost to us.

uniques: Gain a free [Promise: Build a beacon] [in capital] <hidden from users>

civilopediaText.text: You'll have 10 turns to research and construct the beacon

uniques: [-1 Happiness] [in all cities] <for [10] turns>

civilopediaText.text: Reunion
Captain! A group of survivors have reached the city! They claimed that they got attacked by strange bug-like creatures because they got lost trying to find the city.
We are stil missing more people but they'll probably die unless we build something to guide them.
